name: homepageUrl
description: The URL of the homepage. Defaults to `"/"`.

name: productName
description: Product name, used when the product name explicitly includes ‘GOV.UK’ in it. For example, GOV.UK Pay or GOV.UK Design System. Don't use this for service names, as the resulting link text will be incorrect and it prevents users from clicking on the GOV.UK logo to return to the GOV.UK homepage.

name: serviceName
description: Deprecated. The name of your service, included in the header. Use the [Service Header](https://design-system.service.gov.uk/components/service-header/) component instead.

name: serviceUrl
description: Deprecated. URL for the service name anchor. Use the [Service Header](https://design-system.service.gov.uk/components/service-header/) component instead.

name: navigation
description: Deprecated. Can be used to add navigation to the header component. Use the [Service Header](https://design-system.service.gov.uk/components/service-header/) component instead.

params.name: text
params.description: Text for the navigation item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML for the navigation item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: href
params.description: URL of the navigation item anchor.

params.name: active
params.description: Flag to mark the navigation item as active or not.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the navigation item anchor.

name: navigationClasses
description: Deprecated. Classes for the navigation section of the header.

name: navigationLabel
description: Deprecated. Text for the `aria-label` attribute of the navigation. Defaults to the same value as `menuButtonText`.

name: menuButtonLabel
description: Deprecated. Text for the `aria-label` attribute of the button that opens the mobile navigation, if there is a mobile navigation menu.

name: menuButtonText
description: Deprecated. Text of the button that opens the mobile navigation menu, if there is a mobile navigation menu. There is no enforced character limit, but there is a limited display space so keep text as short as possible. By default, this is set to 'Menu'.

name: containerClasses
description: Classes for the container, useful if you want to make the header fixed width.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the header container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the header container.

name: useTudorCrown
description: Deprecated. If `true`, uses the Tudor crown from King Charles III's royal cypher. Otherwise, uses the St. Edward's crown. Default is `true`.

name: slots
description: Specified points for injecting custom HTML into the header.

params.name: start
params.description: HTML injected at the start of the header container.

params.name: end
params.description: HTML injected at the end of the header container.
